sql.if:
<#list columnBos as columnBo> <#if (columnBo.jdbcType == 'VARCHAR') || (columnBo.jdbcType == 'CHAR')>
AND a.${columnBo.jdbcName} = <#noparse>#</#noparse>{params.${columnBo.javaName},jdbcType=${columnBo.jdbcType}}
</#if> <#if (columnBo.jdbcType != 'VARCHAR') && (columnBo.jdbcType != 'CHAR')>
AND a.${columnBo.jdbcName} = <#noparse>#</#noparse>{params.${columnBo.javaName},jdbcType=${columnBo.jdbcType}}
</#if> </#list>
